thread.section_title: Hotel delle Province - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice reasonable clean hotel
thread.title_full: Nice reasonable clean hotel - Review of Hotel delle Province, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Art S
title: Nice reasonable clean hotel
text:
I just got back from Italy yesterday and stayed 5 nights at this hotel. Upon arrival we were assigned an extremely marginal small room. My travel partner posted a mediocre rating on his Facebook account, mostly due to room size and location, and the hotel management apparently read that and changed our room. The room they re-assigned us was considerably more spacious, and had windows and doors to open for fresh air - our first one did not.
I gave this hotel a rating of 4 because it was clean, staff was extremely friendly and helpful, and it is a modestly priced hotel for what you receive. In my opinion it's a great area to stay in with lots of great local restaurants (which are modestly priced), and you can be in Rome center on a short Metro ride.
I can confidently recommend this place, and will happily stay there again on my next trip to Rome.
Room Tip: Ask to see your room first. If it does not suit you I am sure the staff will do what is possible to... See more room tips
